code: {"version":3,"steps":[{"id":"60995f351400-c26f4bd778a8f6de-03cc","type":"prompt","dataType":"[\"Yes\"]","designer":{"xLocation":467,"yLocation":140,"listStyle":3,"next":"5f988c4f8646-d4a934f3b7fa3c0a-de08"},"text":"![Logo](https://storageaccountcovidb8a3.blob.core.windows.net/covid-italy/Header.png)\\r\\nHi, I am here to guide you through a corona disease assessment.\\r\\n\\r\\n**If you have a medical emergency or a life threatening situation dial 1-1-2.**\\r\\n\\r\\nI am not a substitute for professional medical advise, diagnosis, or treatment.\\r\\n\\r\\nDo you accept this and want to proceed?","variable":"agreement","stringId":"stringId_4d2a52d1dc1740c5","choiceType":"choice","layout":"vertical"},{"id":"5f988c4f8646-d4a934f3b7fa3c0a-de08","type":"prompt","dataType":"[\"Zelf evaluatie\", \"Ik heb wat vragen\"]","designer":{"xLocation":480,"yLocation":431,"listStyle":3,"next":"75e20229ab0a-a8d9f888bd21d8f9-c870"},"text":"What is your primary concern?","variable":"concern","stringId":"stringId_91f87ea5a9bd8f97","choiceType":"choice"},{"id":"75e20229ab0a-a8d9f888bd21d8f9-c870","type":"switch","designer":{"xLocation":460,"yLocation":527},"cases":[{"value":"0","targetStepId":"bcd837d91957-85123ef3a27114cc-d445"},{"value":"1","targetStepId":"370554924004-8fed9871aacd93f6-9551"}],"condition":"${concern}.index"},{"id":"370554924004-8fed9871aacd93f6-9551","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":572,"yLocation":648,"next":"7e613b349887-a1288a79c902d416-920e"},"text":"Ok, how can I help?","stringId":"stringId_9ccbff1ca68c4f5c"},{"id":"bcd837d91957-85123ef3a27114cc-d445","type":"beginScenario","designer":{"xLocation":400,"yLocation":651},"scenario":"covid19"},{"id":"7e613b349887-a1288a79c902d416-920e","type":"endwithresult","designer":{"xLocation":592,"yLocation":715},"endScope":"scenario","returnValue":"{}"}],"interrupting":false,"breaking":false,"returningMessage":""}
